content.text:
# 2025 Queensland International – Men's singles

Tristan Schoolkate
| runner   =  Marek Gengel
| score    = 7–6(7–3), 7–6(7–4)
| edition  = 1st
| after_year  = 2025
| after_name   = Queensland International II
}}
This was the first edition of the tournament.
Tristan Schoolkate won the title after defeating Marek Gengel 7–6(7–3), 7–6(7–4) in the final.
Seeds
Rinky Hijikata (second round)
#  Adam Walton (semifinals)
#  Li Tu (first round)
#  Alex Bolt (quarterfinals)
#  Tristan Schoolkate (champion)
#  Omar Jasika (semifinals)
#  Yuta Shimizu (second round)
#  Bernard Tomic (quarterfinals)
}}
